item.title:
RT by @0xstark: Sepolia Incident Update ğŸ“£
We've identified and deployed a fix for the Sepolia deposit contract issue found earlier today. This issue was cause by Sepolia's custom permissioned contract, which is different than mainnet.
All node operators must upgrade their nodes to the versions listed in this blog post: https://blog.ethereum.org/2025/03/05/sepolia-pectra-incident
Validators have already upgraded and the chain is now operating normally. It's possible that some explorers, wallets, or other infrastructure providers have issues until they also upgrade their nodes.
item.dc:creator: @TimBeiko
item.description:
Sepolia Incident Update ğŸ“£

We've identified and deployed a fix for the Sepolia deposit contract issue found earlier today. This issue was cause by Sepolia's custom permissioned contract, which is different than mainnet.

All node operators must upgrade their nodes to the versions listed in this blog post: blog.ethereum.org/2025/03/05â€¦

Validators have already upgraded and the chain is now operating normally. It's possible that some explorers, wallets, or other infrastructure providers have issues until they also upgrade their nodes.

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 40. @CoWSwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) that protects users against MEV.
Cowswap uses frequent batch auctions and other techniques to resist MEV, which means lower fees and more money for users. Cowswap also offers gasless trading, various complex order types, and has the #1 retention rate among major DEXs.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
40. @CoWSwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) that protects users against MEV.

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 39. Vocafi is the 1st place winner of the recent @Safe Agentathon!
Built by Almaz K, Vocafi enables secure voice-controlled DeFi trading, using ai-powered chat assistance, @Ensofi_xyz routing for optimal pricing, and @safe smart accounts.
https://devfolio.co/projects/vocafi-8aba

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: lots of updates these days... i have one more: i am stepping down from Devcon Team Lead role and the incredible @NathanSexer is stepping up to take the interim Team Lead role for Devconnect 2025!!
it is bittersweet, as i love this team and @EFDevcon and @EFDevconnect, but it was never my goal to work longterm on events, and i think in this moment the team is in a great position for this change. a big hearty thank you to all who have been part of this journey â€” your involvement in this community is what makes devcon devconnect and ethereum extraordinary ğŸ«¶
and stay tuned for some more updates from the Devconnect team on Wednesday!! ğŸŒ ğŸ‘€
item.dc:creator: @skylar_eth
item.description:
lots of updates these days... i have one more: i am stepping down from Devcon Team Lead role and the incredible @NathanSexer is stepping up to take the interim Team Lead role for Devconnect 2025!!

it is bittersweet, as i love this team and @EFDevcon and @EFDevconnect, but it was never my goal to work longterm on events, and i think in this moment the team is in a great position for this change. a big hearty thank you to all who have been part of this journey â€” your involvement in this community is what makes devcon devconnect and ethereum extraordinary ğŸ«¶

and stay tuned for some more updates from the Devconnect team on Wednesday!! ğŸŒ ğŸ‘€

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 38. @SuperRare is an NFT marketplace for curated digital art on ethereum.
Since launching in 2018, SuperRare has done over $250M in sales, paid out >$3M in royalties to artists, and home to many top crypto artists who have sold pieces for millions.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
38. @SuperRare is an NFT marketplace for curated digital art on ethereum.

Since launching in 2018, SuperRare has done over $250M in sales, paid out >$3M in royalties to artists, and home to many top crypto artists who have sold pieces for millions.
